text:
We write information to servlet.log that is very helpful in investigation of 
problem reports.  In jakarta-tomcat 3.2.2, each logfile is truncated when 
Tomcat starts, which means that valuable information is lost to us.  We would 
like to see an extension to the Logger element in conf\server.xml that allows 
specification of whether an existing log file should be overwritten (the 
existing situation) or appended to.

In a future version, or in a separate module. We plan to integrate log4j, so
